com.punchline.javalib.entities

Class EntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.EntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentSystem, DebugRenderSystem, GroupSystem, TagSystem, TypeSystem

    public abstract class EntitySystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Base class for all EntitySystems. An EntitySystem contains a predicate for determining which Entities concern it, as well as a process() method for performing logic on Entities.
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntitySystem()
      Constructs an EntitySystem.
      EntitySystem(float interval)
      Constructs an EntitySystem with a required interval between calls of its processEntities() method.

      • canProcess

        public abstract boolean canProcess(Entity e)
        Predicate for determining if an Entity needs to be sent to this system for processing.
        Parameters:
        e - The Entity to be checked.
        Returns:
        Whether this system needs to process the given Entity.

      • getInterval

        public float getInterval()
        Returns:
        The amount of seconds that need to pass between calls of processEntities().

      • getElapsedInterval

        public float getElapsedInterval()
        Returns:
        The amount of seconds that have passed since the last call of processEntities().

        Resets the timer for this system's interval.

      • processEntities

        public void processEntities()
        Processes the given list of entities.
        Parameters:
        entities - A list of all desired entities.

      • deltaSeconds

        public float deltaSeconds()
        Returns:
        The amount of seconds between this call of processEntities() and the previous call of processEntities().

      • processTime

        public float processTime()
        Returns:
        The amount of seconds this system took during its last call of processEntities().
